# 7.0 Docs

## .NET MAUI

- [Constructors accept base interface instead of concrete type](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/maui/7.0/mauiwebviewnavigationdelegate-constructor.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in .NET MAUI where the `MauiWebChromeClient` and `MauiWebViewNavigationDelegate` constructors accept the base interface instead of a specific concrete type.
- [Flow direction helper methods removed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/maui/7.0/flow-direction-apis-removed.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in .NET MAUI where flow direction helper methods have been removed.
- [New UpdateBackground parameter](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/maui/7.0/updatebackground-parameter.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in .NET MAUI where an optional parameter was added to the UpdateBackground method.
- [ScrollToRequest property renamed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/maui/7.0/scrolltorequest-property-rename.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in .NET MAUI where the property for horizontal offset was renamed.
- [Some Windows APIs are removed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/maui/7.0/iwindowstatemanager-apis-removed.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in .NET MAUI where the `IWindowStateManager.ActiveWindowDisplayChanged`, `IWindowStateManager.OnWindowMessage`, and `Platform.OnWindowMessage` APIs have been removed.
